presentation_desc: I'm a Software Engineer, Welcome To My Portfolio
des_first_part: Passionate about creating innovative and high-performance software solutions. With strong experience in Test Automation and software development, and always eager to learn new technologies.
des_second_part: My goal is to turn complex ideas into intuitive and effective applications. I like taking on technical challenges and working as part of dynamic teams
automation_project_description: End-to-End test automation project for my portfolio, using Playwright as a modern and efficient tool, with TypeScript
portfolio_project_description: Portfolio development project, using Angular, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS frameworks for the front end
react_project_description: React-based project powered by Sanity CMS, using Mantine UI for styling
contact_me_desc1: I am always open to new opportunities and exciting collaborations
contact_me_desc2: Send me a message and let's discuss how I can help you!
cordinator_task_A: Coordination with testing teams and development teams
cordinator_task_E: Data automation (implementing scripts to inject data automatically)
java1_course_name: Java Programming: Solving Problems with Software
flutter_course_name: Flutter Essential Training: Build for Multiple Plateformes
project_card_subtitle: Discover my creative and technical projects. Each project tells a unique story
word_hurdle_app_description: Word Hurdle is a mobile application that allows you to play Wordle on your phone
visit_app_card_description: Visit App is an application that allows you to save business cards
earth_quake_app_description: Earthquake App is an application that allows you to track earthquakes
playwright_costum_report_description: Playwright Custom Report is a TypeScript code that allows generating custom test reports
